column1: #Text=I 've been drilling this sequence all day .
#Text=" Iroh says : " No , you are impatient .
#Text=You have yet to master your basics .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The sages tell us that the Avatar is the last airbender .
#Text=He must be over a hundred years old by now .
#Text=He 's had a century to master the four elements !
#Text=I 'll need more than basic firebending to defeat him .
#Text=You will teach me the advanced set !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Very well , but first , I must finish my roast duck .
